SELECT profile_pic
	FROM public.user_detail 
	where user_id = 3

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
  where b.nombre in ($estado) AND c.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)

	FROM gestion.caso a
    --inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id

	  inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
	  inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
  where
    b.nombre in ($estado) AND c.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
    and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 3 or a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio

												inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
												inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
												where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
										   		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
												  and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8) and b.principal is true
												  and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
		inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
		inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia

		and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
		and b.principal is true
		and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

-- Porcentaje de Eficiencia Casos Cerrados
SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (-- Casos Recibidos
                                            SELECT count(a.id)
                                            FROM gestion.caso a
                                            inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                            inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio		
                      											inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                      											inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
                      											inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia											
                                            where c.id_padre in (478) 
											                      and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
                                            and b.principal is true
                                            and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) )::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
  inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio  
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where c.id_padre in (478)
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
	and b.principal is true	and a.id_estatus in (6) 
	and (a.feedback >= 3 or a.verificado = 'SI')

                                              and b.principal is true
                                              and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) )::decimal,2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
